name: komodo
tagline: A self-hosted status page and incident management platform
description: Komodo is a modern web based status page and incident management platform. It allows teams to display service health, schedule maintenance and communicate outages, running fully self hosted for privacy conscious organizations.

features.title: Status Pages
features.description: Public-facing status pages showing service health and uptime. Keep users informed about availability

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Create, update, and resolve incidents with timeline tracking. Manage outages transparently

features.title: Maintenance Scheduling
features.description: Schedule and communicate planned maintenance windows. Set user expectations proactively

features.title: Service Monitoring
features.description: Monitor services with health checks and uptime tracking. Detect issues automatically

features.title: Component Groups
features.description: Organize services into logical groups and categories. Structure status page clearly

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Email and webhook notifications for incidents and updates. Alert stakeholders automatically

features.title: Custom Branding
features.description: Customize status page appearance with logos and colors. Match your brand identity

features.title: Historical Data
features.description: View incident history and uptime statistics over time. Track reliability trends
